docs.text: Sinful Documentation Welcome to the Sinful documentation! This is a guide on how to set up your bot and configurate it to your needs. Hope you enjoy!
docs.title: Sinful Documentation

docs.text: Welcome to the Sinful documentation! This is a guide on how to set up your bot and configurate it to your needs. Hope you enjoy!
docs.title: Sinful Documentation

docs.text: Guide on setting up filter To set up your filter, you will need to run the command automod filter enable . This will tell the bot you want to turn on punishment for the filterlist. After that, you can use the addword <word> command to add a word to the filter. If you want to view the current list, you can use viewlist . To remove a word, use removeword <word> .
docs.title: Filter

docs.text: To set up your filter, you will need to run the command automod filter enable . This will tell the bot you want to turn on punishment for the filterlist. After that, you can use the addword <word> command to add a word to the filter. If you want to view the current list, you can use viewlist . To remove a word, use removeword <word> .
